=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Sdara Aloe Vera Gel For Face and Body - Organic & Natural, Soothing & Cooling For Sunburn Relief, Restorative For Dry Skin - Made In USA Review Date: 2020/06/20 Store: Sdara Skincare Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Sdara Skincare', 'Scent': 'Aloe Vera', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '4.9 x 2.3 x 1.3 inches; 9.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '707486993085'} Review Text: Well - Cold Pressed / Chemical free / Organic Aloe Vera sounded like a great product.
BUT after receiving it, and paying more attention to ingredients I'm sorry I requested it.

PROS
> While the Organic Aloe Vera (Cold Pressed) is what I wanted
> And Citric Acid is OK ingredient for better absorption.

CONS
> I'm at a loss why - Sodium Bicarbonate (baking Soda) is included
> Phenoxyethanol is a BIGGY to AVOID = being it scores as one of the TOP 8 HARMFUL
chemicals to avoid in skin care.
It can have harmful effects on the brain and nervous system.
> Xantham gum - another less than healthy product often included to prevent ingredients
from separating. BUT can cause flue like systems and lung problems.

SDARA SKIN CARE could just as easily made a healthy product
BUT - with 3 of 5 points being negative
I feel this a 2 star product. Review Title: Some Issues Rating: 2.0 --------------------------------------------------

**User Profile Summary:**

- **Preference for Natural Products**: Strong inclination towards organic and chemical-free skincare products, specifically highlighting the importance of ingredient quality in personal care items.

- **Health-Conscious**: The user is mindful of harmful chemicals in skincare products, actively seeking out alternatives that avoid widely recognized harmful substances. 

- **Critical Evaluator**: Demonstrates a critical approach to product reviews, emphasizing both pros and cons based on detailed assessments of ingredients.

- **Skeptical Consumer**: Shows reluctance towards brands that do not prioritize transparency and safety in their formulations, expressing disappointment when products do not meet expected standards.

- **Focus on Efficacy**: Values products that deliver on promises of soothing and restorative effects, particularly in relation to skin conditions like sunburn and dryness.

- **Low Tolerance for Negative Ingredients**: Quickly identifies and critiques problematic components, suggesting a high sensitivity to formulations that contain additives perceived as harmful. 

Overall, this user prioritizes natural, effective skincare solutions and evaluates products rigorously based on ingredient safety and health implications.
